H0.text: Sadler’s Wells Ballet and the Vic-Wells Ballet were the previous names of which British ballet company. Royal Ballet

H1.text: Sadler’s Wells Ballet and the Vic-Wells Ballet were the previous names of which British ballet company. English National Ballet

H2.text: Sadler’s Wells Ballet and the Vic-Wells Ballet were the previous names of which British ballet company. Birmingham Royal Ballet

H3.text: Sadler’s Wells Ballet and the Vic-Wells Ballet were the previous names of which British ballet company. Vic-Wells

A4.text: In 1956, a Royal Charter was granted for both companies and the school; they were subsequently renamed the Royal Ballet, Sadler's Wells Royal Ballet and the Royal Ballet School.

A5.text: It relocated to Birmingham in 1990, being renamed Birmingham Royal Ballet and it ceased to be part of the Royal Ballet in 1997 when it was made independent of the Royal Opera House, with Sir Peter Wright as artistic director.
